sentences.english: I don't know why she gave me the cold shoulder.
sentences.chinese: 我不知道爲什麼她對我愛理不理。

sentences.english: This outfit does not endear me to shopkeepers.
sentences.chinese: 我的這身裝束總讓店主對我愛理不理。
